medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with symptoms of hypothyroidism in 2002; a firm, mobile, 1-cm right midthyroid nodule was found. Fine-needle aspiration results suggested a benign colloid nodule.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypothyroidism and a family history of MEN2A with associated diagnoses of pheochromocytoma and medullary thyroid carcinoma.
medical_history.family_history: Father diagnosed with a right pheochromocytoma at age 52 and subsequently with medullary thyroid carcinoma, familial transmission of a RET mutation at codon 891.
